section.p: You heave aside the heavy stone block that serves as the door, and step into a dark and shadowy antechamber. Ahead, a thin tunnel descends into the black depths of the unknown. Carefully, you edge your way forward. Suddenly, a ghostly apparition hurtles toward you out of the blackness, a glowing mask of ravening hatred, screaming like a banshee.
